Origin: India, Asia, Particularly India, Malaysia and Java
Description: Bonsai are trees and plants grown in containers in such a way so that they look their most beautiful â€“ even prettier than those growing in the wild. Cultivating bonsai, therefore, is a very artistic hobby as well as a traditional Japanese art.
Light_Requirements: At least 6 to 8 hours of daily light.
Watering_Cycle: It is best to water your rubber tree every 1 to 2 weeks
